Example: effective_type_6.c

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <stddef.h>
#include <assert.h>
int main() {
  void *p = malloc(sizeof(float)); assert (p != NULL);
  // is this free of undefined behaviour?
  float f = *((float *)p);
  printf("f=%f\n",f);
}
[link to test in Cerberus and Compiler Explorer]
